entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
